questions.question: What is the correct lyric of the last line in 'Like Spinning Plates'?

choices.text: And this just feels like spinning plates.
I'm living in cloud cuckoo land.
And this just feels like spinning plates.
My body's floating down the muddy river.

questions.question: Thom used the motto of the city of Palo Alto, California, as a lyric in the song 'Palo Alto'. What is that motto?
Which Radiohead artist-in-residence did most of the artwork for 'In Rainbows?'
The lyrics to 'I Will' are in direct reference to what major event that took place in the 90's?

choices.text: Newt Gingrich redefines the American Right.
The O.J. Simpson chase, trial and acquittal.
Napster and the rise of free digital content.

questions.question: These lyrics are from what song? 'Take a look around / There's candles on the cake / On what might have been / The road you should have took / Mistakes mistaken.'
Who does Thom Yorke want to emulate in Pablo Honey's 'Anyone Can Play Guitar'?
